questions.question: What is the Internet?
options: A collection of websites accessible through browsers
A global system of interconnected computer networks
A service that provides email and chat functionality
A protocol for secure data transmission
questions.answer: A global system of interconnected computer networks

questions.question: Which component is NOT typically found in a URL structure?
What is the primary difference between HTTP and HTTPS?
options: HTTPS uses encryption to protect data transmission
HTTP works with more browsers than HTTPS
questions.answer: HTTPS uses encryption to protect data transmission

questions.question: What does DNS stand for and what is its function?
options: Digital Network Security - protects websites from hackers
Data Navigation System - organizes website content
Domain Name System - converts domain names into IP addresses
Dynamic Network Structure - connects multiple servers
questions.answer: Domain Name System - converts domain names into IP addresses
